aboutMe.title: Here all About Me.
aboutMe.responseDescription:
I'm a multi-purpose bot looking to solve the most common problems on a server.
 Here you will find more resources about me in our [documentation](<slot_0>).
### Social Media:
* [join Discord](<slot_1>)
* [Vote me on Top.gg](<slot_2>)
* [Vote me on Discord Bot List](<slot_3>)
* [Help us on Github](<slot_4>)
